data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Teruel to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Teruel, Aragón, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Teruel, Aragón, Spain to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 144,449 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary: On average, 11 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Teruel, Aragón, Spain.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Teruel that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Teruel, Aragón, Spain by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Calamocha
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Calamocha, Aragón, Spain.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Teruel who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Teruel, Aragón, Spain to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Teruel, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
